question.query: what projects have had the most mindshare gain over the last 24 hours

steps.text:
[
  {
    "type": "text",
    "text": "Mindshare gain over the last 24 hours has been dominated by a shift toward **institutional-grade infrastructure** and **agentic commerce** catalysts. While memecoin volatility persists on Solana, the substantive mindshare is currently concentrated in massive structural announcements from Polygon, Celestia, and Hyperliquid.

### Top Mindshare Gainers by Catalyst

1.  **Polygon (10322)**: Gained massive attention following a **$250 million acquisition** of **Coinme** and **Sequence**. This move aims to build the "Polygon Open Money Stack," integrating regulated U.S. fiat on/off-ramps (48 states) with embedded wallet infrastructure. The market is pricing this as a major play for the stablecoin settlement and neobanking verticals.

2.  **Celestia (2651)**: Captured the technical narrative with the announcement of **Fibre**, a ZODA-based data availability (DA) encoding system. Celestia claims this enables **1 Tb/s blockspace**, which is approximately **881x faster** than current KZG-based encoding. This "post-throughput" era positioning targets high-frequency applications like onchain orderbooks and AI-agent micropayments.

![Celestia Blockspace Throughput Iceberg](https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1768326493/veldt/zttsqeqirmgyunq6q5rf.jpg)

### Onchain Momentum & Trading Spikes

On Solana, **U.S Oil ($USOR)** and **Lyn ($LYN)** have seen the most aggressive trader growth. **U.S Oil** is gaining traction as an RWA play for physical oil reserves, seeing a **888% increase in traders** and generating over **$2.1M in 24h volume**. **Lyn** remains a high-velocity memecoin play with a **1,888% spike in trader count** over the same period.

| Project | Symbol | Trader Growth (24h) | Volume (24h) |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Lyn** | LYN | +1,888% | $797K |
| **U.S Oil** | USOR | +888% | $2.19M |
| **Tetsuo Coin** | TETSUO | +518% | $701K |
| **Orynth** | ORY | +260% | $966K |

**Hyperliquid (6373)** maintains a persistent lead in derivatives mindshare. Despite having no active incentives, the protocol is generating **$2M in daily fees**. The recent **$910M buyback** by the Assistance Fund has reinforced a floor for the **HYPE** token, while the rollout of **HIP‑3** (native markets) is expected to further reduce USDC value leakage and drive open interest toward new all-time highs in 2026.

### Institutional Pivot: Pyth and ZKsync

**Pyth Network (10656)** is trending due to the introduction of the **Pyth Reserve**. The protocol now routes **33% of its revenue** (from Pyth Pro and Entropy) into DAO-managed open-market buybacks of **PYTH**. This aligns tokenomics with its growing institutional ARR, which surpassed **$1M in its first month**.

**ZKsync (15022)** released its **2026 Roadmap**, which shifts focus heavily toward "Real-World Adoption." The strategy prioritizes **Prividium** (a privacy platform for enterprises) and the **Airbender zkVM** for settlement. This has re-engaged the institutional narrative for Ethereum L2s, specifically targeting regulated financial entities.",
    "providerMetadata": {
      "google": {
        "thoughtSignature": ""
      }
    }
  }
]

agentResult.finalAnswer:
Mindshare gain over the last 24 hours has been dominated by a shift toward **institutional-grade infrastructure** and **agentic commerce** catalysts. While memecoin volatility persists on Solana, the substantive mindshare is currently concentrated in massive structural announcements from Polygon, Celestia, and Hyperliquid.

### Top Mindshare Gainers by Catalyst

1.  **Polygon (10322)**: Gained massive attention following a **$250 million acquisition** of **Coinme** and **Sequence**. This move aims to build the "Polygon Open Money Stack," integrating regulated U.S. fiat on/off-ramps (48 states) with embedded wallet infrastructure. The market is pricing this as a major play for the stablecoin settlement and neobanking verticals.

2.  **Celestia (2651)**: Captured the technical narrative with the announcement of **Fibre**, a ZODA-based data availability (DA) encoding system. Celestia claims this enables **1 Tb/s blockspace**, which is approximately **881x faster** than current KZG-based encoding. This "post-throughput" era positioning targets high-frequency applications like onchain orderbooks and AI-agent micropayments.

![Celestia Blockspace Throughput Iceberg](https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1768326493/veldt/zttsqeqirmgyunq6q5rf.jpg)

### Onchain Momentum & Trading Spikes

On Solana, **U.S Oil ($USOR)** and **Lyn ($LYN)** have seen the most aggressive trader growth. **U.S Oil** is gaining traction as an RWA play for physical oil reserves, seeing a **888% increase in traders** and generating over **$2.1M in 24h volume**. **Lyn** remains a high-velocity memecoin play with a **1,888% spike in trader count** over the same period.

| Project | Symbol | Trader Growth (24h) | Volume (24h) |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Lyn** | LYN | +1,888% | $797K |
| **U.S Oil** | USOR | +888% | $2.19M |
| **Tetsuo Coin** | TETSUO | +518% | $701K |
| **Orynth** | ORY | +260% | $966K |

**Hyperliquid (6373)** maintains a persistent lead in derivatives mindshare. Despite having no active incentives, the protocol is generating **$2M in daily fees**. The recent **$910M buyback** by the Assistance Fund has reinforced a floor for the **HYPE** token, while the rollout of **HIP‑3** (native markets) is expected to further reduce USDC value leakage and drive open interest toward new all-time highs in 2026.

### Institutional Pivot: Pyth and ZKsync

**Pyth Network (10656)** is trending due to the introduction of the **Pyth Reserve**. The protocol now routes **33% of its revenue** (from Pyth Pro and Entropy) into DAO-managed open-market buybacks of **PYTH**. This aligns tokenomics with its growing institutional ARR, which surpassed **$1M in its first month**.

**ZKsync (15022)** released its **2026 Roadmap**, which shifts focus heavily toward "Real-World Adoption." The strategy prioritizes **Prividium** (a privacy platform for enterprises) and the **Airbender zkVM** for settlement. This has re-engaged the institutional narrative for Ethereum L2s, specifically targeting regulated financial entities.

parameters.instructions: Find projects with the highest mindshare gain over the last 24 hours. Focus on Solana and Ethereum ecosystems. High trader growth and liquidity preferred.
Find trending projects with high trader growth and volume spikes in the last 24 hours. Focus on Solana.

parameters.semantic_query: projects with most mindshare gain and social momentum in the last 24 hours

standardAgentConfig.instructions:
Role: crypto research assistant

        Tools: 'webSearch'

        Utilize web search capabilities to find accurate, current information about crypto projects, trends, and markets.
